examples: he asked the waiter for the check

definitions.text: the key on a typewriter or a word processor that causes a tabulation
a short strip of material attached to or projecting from something in order to facilitate opening or identifying or handling it
examples: pull the tab to open the can
files with a red tab will be stored separately
the collar has a tab with a button hole
the filing cards were organized by cards having indexed tabs

definitions.text: a dose of medicine in the form of a small pellet
